metadata.Title: CVE-2023-41361 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR 9.0. bgpd/bgp_open.c does not check for an overly large length of the rcv software version.

notes.Note: sbeattie> the quagga project was renamed to frr

criterions.comment: quagga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
